attributes.action: Prevent and stop any NHS funding of ex-gay Therapy
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A recent Independent investigation has brought to light that a shocking number of psychotherapists still practice "ex-gay therapy" and are even funded by the NHS to do so.

Why is tax payer money being squandered on something that the Royal College of Psychiatry says is not only harmful, but severely damaging?

The NHS should not be paying to support homophobia and junk science of any kind.
